synopsis.text: April showers bring a rebirth of courage for young Sheng in this captivating short film by Wolf Smoke Animation Studio. As he embarks on a quest to capture the elusive white bird, Sheng confronts the shadows of his own guilt and fear, weaving a tale of self-discovery and transformation. Each character in the film is a vivid brushstroke, carrying rich symbolism that paints a breathtaking cinematic landscape. Winner of the Junior Jury Award for Short Film at the prestigious Annecy International Animated Film Festival in 2017, this animated masterpiece invites viewers on a journey of introspection and redemption, ultimately leading to a powerful rebirth. The film made its commercial debut in China in April 2018, leaving an indelible mark on the hearts of audiences.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
